excerpt: Ecotourism destination with waterfalls, natural swimming pools, hiking trails & horseback riding.
detail_description: Estância Mimosa Ecotourism in Bonito, MS is a nature lover's paradise offering a range of activities such as hiking trails, horseback riding, and the chance to swim in natural pools and under waterfalls. As part of the Rio da Prata Group, it has won awards for its sustainability efforts and is dedicated to preserving the environment. Visitors can explore the gallery forest of Mimoso River, encountering eight different waterfalls along the way.
name: Estância Mimosa Ecoturismo - Cachoeiras em Bonito, MS
address: Rodovia MS 178, S/n, Zona Rural, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

excerpt: Bonito is a town and ecotourism hub in southern Brazil's Mato Grosso do Sul state. The surrounding area is known for crystal-clear rivers such as the Rio da Prata, a snorkeling destination abounding with fish. The Abismo Anhumas is a huge, stalactite-covered cavern that offers abseiling and diving in an underground lake. Flocks of macaws nest in the deep, ocher-colored depression Buraco das Araras.
detail_description: Bonito, located in the Mato Grosso do Sul state of southern Brazil, is a charming town renowned for its ecotourism offerings. The region is famous for its pristine rivers like Rio da Prata, which is perfect for snorkeling amidst abundant fish. Visitors can explore the impressive Abismo Anhumas cave with its stalactite-covered cavern and underground lake suitable for abseiling and diving.
name: Bonito
address: State of Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil

excerpt: Cavernous space with stalactites & stalagmites & a transparent lake with vibrant blue water.
detail_description: Gruta do Lago Azul Natural Monument is a must-see destination in Bonito, known for its breathtaking cavernous space adorned with stalactites and stalagmites. The highlight of the monument is the transparent lake with vibrant blue water at the bottom of the cavern. Visitors can explore various natural attractions such as rivers, lakes, crystal clear pools, and diverse marine life. The area also offers opportunities to observe birds and wild animals while hiking trails that lead to stunning waterfalls.
name: Gruta do Lago Azul Natural Monument
address: Rodovia Frida Garzella dos Santos, KM 20 Rural, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

detail_description: Buraco das Araras Private Natural Heritage Reserve is a must-visit in Bonito, offering various activities such as macaw-spotting, river tubing, zip lining, horseback riding, and waterfall hikes. The reserve is home to diverse wildlife and features the largest sinkhole in South America with a diameter of 160 meters and a depth of 100 meters. Visitors can enjoy an easy trail leading to the edge of the impressive hole in the ground.
name: Buraco das Araras Private Natural Heritage Reserve
address: Jardim, MS, 79240-000, Brazil

excerpt: Vast underground lake popular with divers known for its striking rock formations & clear waters.
detail_description: Abismo Anhumas is a remarkable underground lake that attracts divers with its stunning rock formations and crystal-clear waters. It offers a unique experience for adventure enthusiasts, providing opportunities for abseiling and diving in the vast cavern adorned with stalactites. The site also boasts an ochre-colored depression called Buraco das Araras, where flocks of macaws nest.
name: Abismo Anhumas
address: Bonito, State of Mato Grosso do Sul, 79290-000, Brazil

excerpt: Waterfalls including a 156m-high cascade, popular for swimming, hiking & a rappelling platform.
detail_description: Waterfall Boca da Onca is a must-visit destination for adventure seekers. It boasts a 156m-high cascade, perfect for swimming and hiking. The area also offers opportunities to witness the fluctuation in the Sucuri and Natural Aquarium rivers, as well as explore other nearby attractions like Parque das Cachoeiras, Serra da Bodoquena waterfalls, Lagoa Misteriosa, and Abismo Anhumas.
name: Waterfall Boca da Onca
address: Rodovia Bodoquena Bonito MS 178, Km 96 - Zona rural, Bodoquena - MS, 79390-000, Brazil

excerpt: Deep sinkhole pool known for its clear blue water, with a trail, snorkeling & guided scuba diving.
detail_description: Lagoa Misteriosa is a captivating natural wonder featuring a deep sinkhole pool with remarkably clear blue water, making it perfect for activities like snorkeling and guided scuba diving. The area also offers shared transportation options that include a full-day trip with the opportunity to enjoy flutuacao in the Rio da Prata and savor a delicious homemade lunch buffet at Recanto Ecologico Rio da Prata.
name: Lagoa Misteriosa
address: Rodovia MS 178 Sentido Bonito a BR 267 Jardim/Porto Murtinho Cx postal 136 Zona Rural, Jardim - MS, 79240-000, Brazil

detail_description: Parque das Cachoeiras, located 18 kilometers from Bonito, is a nature lover's paradise with six beautiful waterfalls, small grottoes, and invigorating springs perfect for swimming. Nearby Estancia Mimosa offers an additional seventh waterfall and a delightful home-cooked lunch at the fazenda house.
name: Parque das Cachoeiras
address: Parque das Cachoeiras Ecoturismo, MS-178 - Bonito, MS, 79290-000, Brazil

detail_description: Grutas de São Miguel is one of the notable caves in Bonito, along with Gruta Sao Mateus and Gruta do Lago Azul. The latter features a stunning sapphire and tourmaline lake 330 feet below the surface, making it one of the largest water-filled caves on Earth. The natural monument is protected under conservation statuses, offering limited tours daily.
name: Grutas de São Miguel Dia e Noite
address: Rodovia Tres Morros, Km 0 - Zona Rural, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

detail_description: Raras - Aquário Natural is a stunning snorkelling destination known for its incredibly clear waters. To reach this picturesque site, visitors take a peaceful 25-minute walk through beautiful scenery. Once there, they can marvel at the diverse and colorful fish species as well as vibrant underwater plant life while snorkeling. Additionally, visitors have the opportunity to enjoy activities such as zip lining and swimming in this breathtaking natural setting.
name: Raras - Aquário Natural
address: rod. bonito guia lopes da laguna - k 01, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

detail_description: Pantanal offers an exciting tour that includes a photographic safari and a fishing boat trip to search for the famous piranhas. It's a great opportunity to explore the stunning natural beauty of this region and engage in thrilling activities like wildlife photography and fishing. San Francisco Day Use is also available for visitors looking to make the most of their time in Pantanal.
name: Pantanal
address: R. Ari da Silva Machado, 500 - Formoso, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

detail_description: Casa do João is a renowned restaurant in Bonito, known for its traditional cuisine and warm atmosphere. Managed by chef Felipe Caran, the restaurant's signature dish is the boneless traira, expertly fried to perfection. Additionally, Casa do João is celebrated for serving typical Pantanal dishes such as moqueca pantaneira, a tantalizing blend of pintado fish, cassava, palm oil, and plantains.
name: Casa do João
address: R. Cel. Nelson Felício dos Santos, 664 - Centro, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

excerpt: Snorkeling tours from a complex with a restaurant & pool to a clear river teeming with fish.
detail_description: Natural Aquarium in Bonito is a renowned destination for ecotourism and snorkeling. The Baia Bonita river forms a stunning natural aquarium, offering visitors the chance to explore its clear waters teeming with diverse fish species. Located within the Baia Bonito Ecological Reserve, the tour begins with a scenic forest walk leading to the Baia Bonita Spring. Snorkeling downstream allows guests to marvel at the vibrant underwater flora, creating an immersive experience akin to being inside a real aquarium.
name: Natural Aquarium
address: Rodovia Bonito - Guia Lopes da Laguna, Km 7 S/n, Zona Rural, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

excerpt: Opened in 2005, this center allows visitors to learn about, view & interact with snakes.
detail_description: Established in 2005, Projeto Jibóia is a center dedicated to educating visitors about non-venomous snakes and their behaviors. Founded by Henry Naufal, the project aims to promote knowledge about the region's snake species in a fun and engaging way, dispelling negative perceptions and combating illegal hunting.
name: Projeto Jibóia
address: R. Nestor Fernandes, 610 - Formoso, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

detail_description: Eco Park Porto da Ilha offers a variety of outdoor activities for the whole family. Visitors can enjoy rafting and buoy-cross on the Rio Formoso, pedal water bikes, row inflatable kayaks, or try stand-up paddle. For those seeking more adrenaline, there's the option to rappel into the Salobra River canyon. The park also features boat trips, duck rides, electric boats, and a restaurant for dining.
name: Eco Park Porto da Ilha
address: Park. Rodovia do Turismo, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

excerpt: Ecotourism destination offering snorkeling, scuba diving, horseback riding & birdwatching.
detail_description: Recanto Ecológico Rio da Prata in Bonito, MS is an ecotourism destination that offers a variety of activities such as snorkeling, scuba diving, horseback riding, and birdwatching. The tour begins with a pleasant walk through the riparian of Prata River and an interpretive trail where visitors can observe various trees, orchids, bromeliads, mammals, and different species of birds.
name: Recanto Ecológico Rio da Prata - Flutuação em Bonito MS
address: km 512 Rodovia BR-267 Zona Rural Zona Rural, Bonito - MS, 79240-000, Brazil

name: Primeira Nascente Rio Sucuri
address: Bonito, MS, 79290-000, Brazil

detail_description: Bonito Municipal Balneary is a popular spot for both locals and tourists, offering a relaxed atmosphere and activities for the whole family. Unlike other attractions in Bonito, it allows visitors to explore at their own pace without a guide. Situated along the Rio Formoso, this balneary features crystal-clear waters perfect for swimming and observing fish. The facilities include restrooms, parking, snack bars, restaurants, and even wheelchair-accessible amenities.
name: Balneario Municipal, Bonito
address: R. Cel. Pílad Rébua, 1780 - Bonito, MS, 79290-000, Brazil

excerpt: Ecotourism spot with snorkeling in the crystal-clear Sucuri river, plus biking & horseback riding.
detail_description: Sucuri River Bonito Ecotourism offers a unique experience in the Brazilian hinterland. The area was once remote farmland, but locals recognized its exceptional natural beauty and developed ecotourism to preserve it. The Sucuri River is renowned for its crystal-clear waters and has been featured in TV shows. Visitors can enjoy snorkeling, biking, and horseback riding while taking in the pristine surroundings.
name: Sucuri River Bonito Ecotourism
address: Fazenda São Geraldo 18 Rodovia Bonito Zona Rural, Bonito - MS, 79290-000, Brazil

name: Balneário do Sol
address: VH5V+2R, Bonito, MS, 79290-000, Brazil
